Introduction to Mechanics Design

You will explore different smoke and mirrors trickery used within the games industry to make games feel better to play. On completion of this module, you will understand how to manipulate your systems to make them feel more fun.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Associate how game mechanics work to create fun experiences through researching similar titles and breaking down their approach.

+  Experiment with gameplay mechanic solutions to improve gameplay experiences.

+  Explain how different mechanics can be utilised to improve game feel.

+  Diagnose issues with mechanics that are causing them to lose their fun factor.
